account_not_approved: Your account is not approved yet!

whatsapp_message: Hello, I would like to subscribe to the course.
sign_in_desc: Sign in to your Nawaia account.
username_min: Username must be at least 3 characters.
username_regex: Username must consist of English letters and numbers.
email_invalid: Please enter a valid email address.
password_min: Password must be at least 8 characters.
password_lower: Password must contain at least one lowercase letter.
password_upper: Password must contain at least one uppercase letter.
password_digit: Password must contain at least one number.
password_special: Password must contain at least one special character (e.g. !@#$).
password_chars: Please use English letters, numbers and symbols only for password.
phone_invalid: Please enter a valid phone number.
approval_notice: ** Approval may take up to 24 hours.
about_us_desc: Learn more about Nawaia and our mission.
